references.reason: This paper introduces COLMAP, a widely used Structure-from-Motion method that is used by the algorithm in this work, as a baseline to measure results against.

references.paper_title: DROID-SLAM: Deep Visual SLAM for Monocular, Stereo, and RGB-D Cameras
references.reason: This paper introduces DROID-SLAM, a learning-based SLAM method that is used by the algorithm in this work, as a baseline to measure results against.

references.paper_title: Optical Flow Estimation from a Single Motion-blurred Image
references.reason: This paper describes a method of estimating optical flow from a single motion blurred image, and is cited as it is an early paper in the field of motion from blur and this work aims to build on top of this.

references.paper_title: Grounding image matching in 3d with mast3r
references.reason: This paper introduces MASt3R, a current SOTA learning-based 3D vision method, and is used by this algorithm in this work, as a baseline to measure results against.

references.paper_title: RAFT: Recurrent All-Pairs Field Transforms for Optical Flow
references.reason: This paper introduces RAFT, a method for estimating optical flow across frames, and is cited in relation to DROID-SLAM, which utilizes RAFT for camera pose computation.
